name: .Q3C File Extension
summary: Learn about .Q3C files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Cover design created by Quick 3D Cover, a program used to create artwork for eBooks, software boxshots, DVD cases, and other products; saves the selected product template as well as text, images, dimensions, and graphical effects for the image; may be saved using different 3D angles and views.

content: Quick 3D Cover can export designs in several raster file formats, including .JPG, .PNG, .GIF, and .BMP. The images are commonly included in Web pages, user manuals, and other digital publications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
